Actions.Name: Get Response Details in CSV Format
Actions.Description: Export detailed response and survey data in CSV format. This premium feature is currently open to certain SurveyMonkey plans for a limited time.

Actions.Name: Get Response Details in JSON Format
Actions.Description: Export detailed response and survey data in JSON format. This premium feature is currently open to certain SurveyMonkey plans for a limited time.

Actions.Name: Get a survey
Actions.Description: Get details of a specific survey.

Actions.Name: When a new collector response is added
Actions.Description: Triggers a new flow when a response is added (paid account only).

Actions.Name: When a new survey response is added
Actions.Description: Triggers a new flow when a survey response is added (paid account only).

Actions.Name: When a new survey response to a question is added
Actions.Description: Triggers a new flow when a response to a question is added (paid account only).

Actions.Name: When a new collector is created
Actions.Description: Triggers a new flow when a collector is created.

Actions.Name: When a new survey is created
Actions.Description: Triggers a new flow when a survey is created.

Actions.Name: Schedule an existing invite message
Actions.Description: Send or schedule to send an existing message to all message recipients.
